sentences.sContent: She was really of the cold frog.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was really of the cold frog.
sentences.sCn: 她真的很害怕这只冰冷的青蛙。

sentences.sContent: Maybe a little frog on my hip, or a gecko.
sentences.sContent_eng: Maybe a little frog on my hip, or a gecko.
sentences.sCn: 也许在臀部刺一只小青蛙还是壁虎什么的。

remMethod.val: 井底之蛙(frog)问乌龟从(from)哪里来

trans.tranOther: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping
